metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12668 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePCXImage in coders/pcx.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0132-Fix-a-memory-leak-in-PCX-coder.patch in unstable 0283-CVE-2017-12668-Fix-memory-leak-in-WritePCXImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
